CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(IT_Apparatus_Type__c, "002"), 'Fax', IF(ISPICKVAL(IT_Apparatus_Type__c, "005"), 'Mail', IF(ISPICKVAL(IT_Apparatus_Type__c, "007"), 'Mail PEC', IF(ISPICKVAL(IT_Apparatus_Type__c, "001")&& BEGINS( IT_Contact_Info__c , '3') , 'Mobile', 'Phone') ) ) )
CustomField.label: Salesforce Type
